headline: First Solar (FSLR) Q4 2025 Earnings Transcript
summary: Since our last earnings call, we secured gross bookings of 2.3 gigawatts excluding domestic India volume, and 0.1 gigawatt of low-bin inventory clearance.  In addition, we announced plans to onshore the finishing of Series 6 modules initiated at our international factories by adding U.S. finishing capacity with a new facility in South Carolina.

raw.headline: First Solar (FSLR) Q4 2025 Earnings Transcript

In addition, we announced plans to onshore the finishing of Series 6 modules initiated at our international factories by adding U.S. finishing capacity with a new facility in South Carolina.

headline: First Solar Offers Lower Than Expected Revenue Outlook for 2026. The Stock Is Falling.
summary: First Solar  stock was falling 11% after offering downside revenue guidance for the 2026 fiscal year.  The solar panel maker reported fourth-quarter earnings of $4.84 a share, 30 cents below the average analyst estimate as tracked by FactSet.  First Solar’s stock is down 6.9% year to date but up 55.1% over the past 12 months.

headline: First Solar (NASDAQ:FSLR) Beats Q4 CY2025 Sales Expectations But Stock Drops 10.2%
summary: Solar panel manufacturer First Solar (NASDAQ:FSLR) beat Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q4 CY2025, with sales up 11.1% year on year to $1.68 billion. On the other hand, the company’s full-year revenue guidance of $5.05 billion at the midpoint came in 17.4% below analysts’ estimates. Its GAAP profit of $4.84 per share was 6.3% below analysts’ consensus estimates.

Its GAAP profit of $4.84 per share was 6.3% below analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: First Solar: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The average estimate of 11 analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $5.22 per share. The largest U.S. solar company posted revenue of $1.68 billion in the period, exceeding Street forecasts. Ten analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $1.57 billion.

headline: First Solar, Oxford PV Enter into Patent Licensing Agreement for US Markets
summary: PHOENIX, February 24, 2026--First Solar, Inc. (Nasdaq: FSLR) ("First Solar" or "the Company") today announced a patent licensing agreement that gives it access to existing issued patents and currently pending patent applications of Oxford Photovoltaics Limited ("Oxford PV").
